Restaurant Review

Bella Notte

Address: 3016B Bathurst St, North York, ON

Rating: ****

Bella Notte transports diners to Italy with its charming ambiance, complete with candle-lit tables, soft Italian music, and a warm, rustic interior that feels authentic and inviting. Located uptown, this Italian eatery has earned a reputation for serving traditional dishes with a focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients. The Margherita Pizza is a simple yet perfect combination of tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil on a thin, crispy crust, providing a classic taste of Italy. For heartier fare, the Osso Buco is a standout, featuring slow-braised veal shank with creamy polenta and a bright gremolata that adds a deliciously tangy note. No Italian meal would be complete without dessert, and Bella Notte’s Tiramisu does not disappoint—layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream make for a dreamy, light finish. Bella Notte delivers a rich, authentic Italian experience, making it a gem for lovers of Italian cuisine.

Reviewed on 11/13/2024
